title: Small Lot of T205s Available! - ALL SOLD!
author: Eggoman

posts.post_title: Small Lot of T205s Available! - ALL SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Hello All!

This will be my only reduction in price before I turn 'em loose on eBay.

I just got back some freshly-graded T205s!  (I will list the T205s that got “numbers” later when I get a chance…that probably means next week???)

ALL cards are Blue Piedmont Factory 25 backs, unless noted. 

[STRIKE]AMES – Green Sovereign 25 – SGC A – [STRIKE]$25[/STRIKE] - $20 – I have NO idea why it got the “A” – either trimmed or re-colored???[/STRIKE] - SOLD!

[strike]GASPAR – Green Sovereign 25 – SGC A – $25  - $20 – looks to be trimmed[/strike] - SOLD!

[STRIKE]LEEVER – SGC A – [STRIKE]$25[/STRIKE] - $20 – This one surprised me…glue residue on reverse (I think), does NOT look trimmed OR re-colored to me…[/STRIKE] - SOLD!

[STRIKE]MURPHY – SGC A – [STRIKE]$25[/STRIKE] - $20 – Danny is looking a little thin…[/STRIKE] - SOLD!

Please message me if you are interested.  I will sell these cards in the order that I receive your requests. "A commitment to buy takes precedence over ongoing negotiations.”  (I stole that phraseology from someone, but I DO like it!)

(All prices are “Net to Me” and include shipping.)

PayPal – Friends or Family is preferred OR “Regular” PayPal + 3%!

Thank you for your consideration!

REDUCED!

Can you use any of 'em???
All Cards Sold!  THANKS FOR LOOKING!
